additionalInfo.label: Optional additional information
additionalInfo.helperText: Add additional information to the site's privacy settings.

allowPrivacyConfig.label: Show privacy notice on the site

blocking.label: Block interaction on the site
blocking.helperText: The privacy notice will block interaction within your site until the visiting user makes a selection.

policyURL.label: Optional more information link
policyURL.helperText: Provide a link to your cookies policy for your organization.
